participant_1.background: i live in colorado. i am a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.

participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

hi how are you doing? do you like hiking?
what kind of charity do you donate? what is your job?
